headline: A Look At Equifax (EFX) Valuation After Mar Vista Exit And FICO Credit Score Shift
summary: Equifax (EFX) is back in focus after Mar Vista U.S. Quality Strategy fully exited its position, citing FICO's move to sell credit scores directly to mortgage underwriters and a slower housing market recovery. See our latest analysis for Equifax. At a share price of $219.57, Equifax has had a mixed run, with a 2.6% year to date share price return but a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 15.8%. This suggests momentum has faded recently as investors reassess risks around credit scoring...
